titles.title: A resolution to authorize the termination of the 1903 lease on Guantanamo Bay, as a gesture of good will, at such time as democracy is achieved in Cuba.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16956-19657)
Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that when freedom and democracy are achieved in Cuba, the United States should unilaterally terminate the 1903 lease on its facilities at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, as a gesture of good will toward the people of Cuba.
